pr_title: Fixed that does not auto detect XML files from URL #2420

timeline.message: Fixed that does not auto detect XML files from URL #2420

timeline.bodyText: It would be good to also recognize the +xml suffix as a fallback when we don't have a more specific type, e.g. application/atom+xml but that would require introducing additional generality into the underlying code, so perhaps we can spin that off as a separate issue. We already support a few of the more specific ones such as application/rdf+xml.
timeline.author: tfmorris
